message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.IR, cs.LG 

This paper deals with hate speech detection in social media, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper discusses community detection and data collection, which fall under the sub-categories of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.SOC (Social and Societal Computing). The paper also mentions the use of keywords and classification techniques, which are related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG).
